jd: From: Suraj Prashar, Pivotal Technologies suraj.prashar@pivotal-technologies.com Reply to: suraj.prashar@pivotal-technologies.com Hi, Hope you are doing great!!Please find the requirement below, If you find yourself comfortable with the requirement please reply back with your updated resume andI will get back to you or I would really appreciate if you can give me a call back at my contact number (703) 570-8775 * (Ext. 232). Job Title: ERP Project ManagerLocation: St Paul, MN (Hybrid)Duration: 6+ MonthsInterview: VideoVisa Type: USC/GC/GCEAD/H4EAD Local or Nearby Only Job Description:The ERP Project Manager is responsible for the ERP module implementation in partnership with a primary PM, vendor mgmt., partnering with internal teams, facilitates communication and information exchange between external groups and the project team resources. Focus will be on data conversion/migration aspects of the ERP implementation and additional responsibilities as needed.Strongly prefer:5+ yrs of PM experience minimumExperience with ERP implementationsExperience with data migration/conversionFamiliarity with Smart Sheet, Excel and Agile Tool experience including JiraComfortable with high performing and fast-paced culture
